components.description: The FTP Delete component allows to delete a file from a remote FTP server. The path of the file to be deleted might be a static or dynamic value. If the path is not given, the name of the file to be deleted is taken from the message payload. An error is thrown if the payload is not of type String or if the evaluated path is empty or null.

properties.name: connection
properties.description: FTP connection configuration to be used to execute the delete operation.

objectProperties.name: host
objectProperties.description: Sets the connection host the FTP client should connect to.

objectProperties.name: port
objectProperties.description: Sets the connection port the FTP client should use for the connection.

objectProperties.name: username
objectProperties.description: The username to be used to create the FTP connection.

objectProperties.name: password
objectProperties.description: The username to be used to create the FTP connection.

objectProperties.name: workingDir
objectProperties.description: The path to a directory that is treated as the root of every relative path used with this connector.

properties.name: path
properties.description: The path and name of the file to delete from the remote FTP server. If not present, the message payload is taken as path.

components.description: The FTP List Files component allows to list all the files from a remote FTP server directory. If the property recursive is true, the listing of the files is recursive starting from the configuredworking directory in the Connection configuration. The component allows to also only list files or directories.

properties.name: connection
properties.description: FTP connection configuration to be used to list files from.

objectProperties.name: host
objectProperties.description: Sets the connection host the FTP client should connect to.

objectProperties.name: port
objectProperties.description: Sets the connection port the FTP client should use for the connection.

objectProperties.name: username
objectProperties.description: The username to be used to create the FTP connection.

objectProperties.name: password
objectProperties.description: The username to be used to create the FTP connection.

objectProperties.name: workingDir
objectProperties.description: The path to a directory that is treated as the root of every relative path used with this connector.

properties.name: path
properties.description: The path from which files will be listed from the remote FTP server. The path can be a static or a dynamic value. If both path and working directory from the connection configuration are present they are appended to each other and the final path is computed as follow: /{WORKING_DIRECTORY}/{PATH}.

properties.name: recursive
properties.description: If true files are listed recursively starting from the working directory taken from the connection configuration.

properties.name: filesOnly
properties.description: If true only files are listed from the working directory taken from the connection configuration.

properties.name: directoriesOnly
properties.description: If true only directories are listed from the working directory taken from the connection configuration.

components.description: The FTP Retrieve component allows to download a file from a remote FTP server. The path of the file to download might be a static or dynamic value. If the path is not given, the name of the file to download is taken from the message payload. An error is thrown if the payload is not of type String or if the evaluated path is empty or null.

properties.name: connection
properties.description: FTP connection configuration to be used to retrieve files from.

objectProperties.name: host
objectProperties.description: Sets the connection host the FTP client should connect to.

objectProperties.name: port
objectProperties.description: Sets the connection port the FTP client should use for the connection.

objectProperties.name: username
objectProperties.description: The username to be used to create the FTP connection.

objectProperties.name: password
objectProperties.description: The username to be used to create the FTP connection.

objectProperties.name: workingDir
objectProperties.description: The path to a directory that is treated as the root of every relative path used with this connector.

properties.name: path
properties.description: The path and name of the file to retrieve from the remote FTP server. If not present, the message payload is taken as path.

components.description: The FTP Store component allows to store a file to a remote FTP server. The path of the file to store might be a static or dynamic value. The path of the file is mandatory and if not present an error will be thrown by the component.The content of the file to store can be a static or dynamic value. If not present, the content of the file is implicitly taken from the message payload.

properties.name: connection
properties.description: FTP connection configuration to be used to execute the store operation.

objectProperties.name: host
objectProperties.description: Sets the connection host the FTP client should connect to.

objectProperties.name: port
objectProperties.description: Sets the connection port the FTP client should use for the connection.

objectProperties.name: username
objectProperties.description: The username to be used to create the FTP connection.

objectProperties.name: password
objectProperties.description: The username to be used to create the FTP connection.

objectProperties.name: workingDir
objectProperties.description: The path to a directory that is treated as the root of every relative path used with this connector.

properties.name: path
properties.description: The path and name of the file to store to the remote FTP server.

properties.name: content
properties.description: The content of the file to store to the remote FTP server. If not present, the message payload is taken as content of the file.
